message.content:
cs.NI, cs.LG, cs.IT, cs.SY, cs.MM

This paper deals with the problem of maximizing the performance of IEEE 802.11 Wireless Local Area Networks (WLANs) through the use of decentralized mechanisms. It proposes a solution based on Multi-Armed Bandits (MABs) to dynamically adjust frequency channel, transmit power, and sensitivity threshold. This paper involves concepts related to networking (cs.NI), machine learning (cs.LG), information theory (cs.IT), control systems (cs.SY), and multimedia (cs.MM).
